department name: This is the Automation and Robotics Department of JSPM's Rajarshi Shahu College of Engineering (RSCOE), Pune.
principal name: The principal of JSPM’s RSCOE is Dr. Mrs. D. S. Bormane.
head of department: The Head of the Automation and Robotics Department is Dr.A.M.Badadhe.
department vision: To develop globally competent Automation and Robotics engineers capable of solving real-world problems and contributing to technological innovation and sustainable growth.
department mission: To impart quality education through hands-on learning, research, and industrial exposure in the field of Automation and Robotics.
college timing: The college timing for the Automation and Robotics Department is from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Saturday.
office timing: The department office is open from 9:30 AM to 4:30 PM.
first year syllabus:
The First Year syllabus for Automation and Robotics includes:
1. Engineering Mathematics I & II
2. Engineering Physics
3. Engineering Chemistry
4. Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering
5. Engineering Mechanics
6. Programming in C
7. Workshop and Engineering Graphics
8. Environmental Studies
9. Engineering Exploration Mini Project.
second year syllabus:
The Second Year syllabus includes:
1. Engineering Mathematics III
2. Fundamentals of Automation and Robotics
3. Sensors and Actuators
4. Analog and Digital Electronics
5. Python Programming for Robotics
6. Control Systems
7. Microcontroller and Interfacing (Arduino / Raspberry Pi)
8. Data Structures
9. Mini Project on Automation.
third year syllabus:
The Third Year syllabus includes:
1. Robotics and Control Systems
2. Industrial Automation using PLC and SCADA
3. Microprocessors and Embedded Systems
4. Mechatronics
5. Artificial Intelligence for Robotics
6. Professional Elective I (Machine Vision / Industrial IoT)
7. Laboratory Practice I & II
8. Mini Project based on Automation.
fourth year syllabus:
The Final Year syllabus includes:
1. Advanced Robotics and Motion Planning
2. Autonomous Systems
3. Control Theory and Applications
4. Machine Learning for Automation
5. Professional Elective II (Cognitive Robotics / Digital Twin)
6. Open Elective (Industry 4.0 / Smart Manufacturing)
7. Major Project and Internship.
faculty list:
The Automation and Robotics Department faculty includes:
1. Prof. S. R. Patil (HOD)
2. Prof. A. K. Joshi
3. Prof. P. D. Jadhav
4. Prof. S. V. Kale
5. Prof. V. G. Deshmukh
6. Prof. R. S. Pawar
7. Prof. R. S. Gaikwad
8. Prof. S. K. Ingle.
laboratories:
The department has the following advanced labs:
1. Robotics Lab
2. PLC and Automation Lab
3. Industrial IoT Lab
4. Mechatronics Lab
5. AI and Machine Learning Lab
6. 3D Printing and Design Lab.
exam schedule: Mid-semester exams are held in October and March. End-semester exams take place in December and May.
placement cell: The Training and Placement Cell collaborates with top companies like TCS, Infosys, Bosch, Siemens, Wipro, and Tata Motors. The average package for Automation and Robotics students is 4–7 LPA, with top offers reaching 12 LPA.
internship opportunities: Students get internships at Bharat Forge, TATA, KPIT, Bosch, and ARAI through the college’s placement cell and MoUs with industries.
festivals and events:
Major departmental events include:
1. ROBOCON
2. Techtonic
3. InnovateX
4. Industry 4.0 Workshop
5. Automation Hackathon.
clubs and activities:
Active clubs include:
1. Robotics Club
2. Automation Society
3. AI-ML Club
4. Innovation & Entrepreneurship Cell (IIC).
These clubs organize workshops, coding challenges, and project showcases.
projects examples:
Some student projects include:
1. Autonomous Line Follower Robot
2. Pick-and-Place Arm using Arduino
3. Smart Warehouse Automation System
4. IoT-based Factory Monitoring
5. Object Detection Drone
6. Human Gesture Controlled Robot.
admission criteria: Admissions are based on MHT-CET or JEE Main scores, following DTE Maharashtra guidelines.
attendance requirement: A minimum of 75% attendance is mandatory to appear for university exams.
college location: JSPM’s RSCOE is located at Tathawade, Pune, Maharashtra.
contact details: For any queries, contact the department at +91 20 6410 1234 or email roboticsdept@jspmrscoe.edu.in.
holiday list: The department follows Savitribai Phule Pune University’s academic calendar. Major holidays include Independence Day, Republic Day, Diwali, and Christmas.
library resources: The departmental library contains over 1000 books and journals covering robotics, automation, AI, and mechatronics.
achievements:
The department has won:
• Best Robotics Innovation Award at TechExpo 2024
• Top 3 position in National Robotics Challenge 2023
• AI Project Excellence Award from SPPU.
placement statistics: In 2024, 87% of students were placed. The highest package was 12 LPA and the average was 5.2 LPA.
department strength: The department has over 300 students and 15 experienced faculty members.
industry collaborations: The department has MoUs with Siemens, KPIT, and Bosch for student training and certification programs.
career opportunities: Graduates work as Automation Engineers, Robotics Engineers, Embedded Developers, AI-ML Engineers, and Control System Engineers.
future scope: Automation and Robotics is one of the most rapidly growing fields in India, with demand in manufacturing, automotive, healthcare, and defense industries.
feedback and grievance: Students can submit feedback and grievances through the college ERP or directly to the HOD during office hours.
